description: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 67.5 health, 0.38 health regen, 0.3% magic resistance and 3 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 54 health, 0.3 health regen and 0.24% magic resistance.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 54 health, 0.3 health regen and 0.24% magic resistance.
